titles: Queries upon queries, or, Enquiries into Certain queries upon Dr. Pierce's sermon at Whitehall, Feb. 1
author: Dobson, John, 1633-1681.
notes: A reply to Certain queries upon Dr. Pierces sermon at Whitehall Feb. 1.
This defense of Pierce was one item in a series by Dobson which finally resulted in his expulsion from Oxford on the grounds of libeling Henry Yerbury.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691. --  Primitive rule of reformation.
Certain queries upon Dr. Pierces sermon, at Whitehall, Feb. 1.
